types.name: Swords
types.description: Sharp, and pointy objects made for chopping, slicing, and slashing

types.name: Hammers/Maces
types.description: Heavy, large, and strong objects made for smashing, bashing, and clashing

types.name: Daggers
types.description: Small, discreet, and deadly objects made for sneaking, stabbing, and all 'round devious purposes

types.name: Bow/Arrows
types.description: Silent, and deadly objects made for solving problems you don't want to get near

types.name: Spells
types.description: Deadly, and Ancient knowledge made only for the most enlightened individuals

types.name: Guns
types.description: Devastatingly deadly weapons made to drop even the biggest of foes.
